Articles.Content: um i was playing kerbal space program newest update and i was playing for like 1 hour and the whole time i seen unidentified flying objects i see them go across the screen fast like RODS which is a thing connected to ufos and i see circular crafts out in the open i was scared the whole time and i randomly start seeing smoke in the distance and it wasnt no other rocket i lunched because i used the first the whole time and restarted the flight o it resets every thing. so did any one else ever experience a ufo in the kerbal galaxy?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/36863-What-not-to-suggest

"Aliens will not be in the game". Under the Miscellaneous section. You didn't see a UFO in this game.

maybe you should consider upgrading your keyboard. They make them now with period and comma keys, colons and semi-colons, enter keys, and other nice things like that.

Result is being able to write coherent sentences that other people can comprehend.
Press F1 if and when you see them to take a screenshot, then upload them to a pic sharing website.
Pull the other one, it's got bells on.
Calm down... What you're seeing in the sky is known as "The Mun" and "Kerbol"
Somehow I don't really believe this story, as much as I would like to.

It's marsh gas...

But more sensibly there is a graphical glitch that causes exhaust to sometimes appear in front of the vehicle and seem to shoot past it. I'm guessing that this is what you're trying to describe.

Relax, it's just the light of Eve reflecting off of some kethane clouds. KSP is certainly not a secret project by aliens to make humanity interested in large explosives and space travel so they can claim we are a threat and justify destroying us all.
Seems like the same kind of person that would think a photo artifact is an "orb" of a ghost and a insect streak in a frame is a "rod".

Relax, it's just the light of Eve reflecting off of some kethane clouds. KSP is certainly not a secret project by aliens to make humanity interested in large explosives and space travel so they can claim we are a threat and justify destroying us all.

That would seem like a highly redundant project.

Seems like the same kind of person that would think a photo artifact is an "orb" of a ghost and a insect streak in a frame is a "rod".

No, I think it's someone trying to be clever. Without much success.

Could it be you're spotting Minmus by mistake? I thought it was a piece of floating debris for a while, and tried to chase it with my plane.

I could never catch up to the darn thing....

Could it be you're spotting Minmus by mistake? I thought it was a piece of floating debris for a while, and tried to chase it with my plane.

I could never catch up to the darn thing....

Obviously, you needed Moar Thrust.
